title: Spatio-temporal distribution and socioeconomic inequality of ...
summary: This post analyzes the spatio-temporal distribution and socioeconomic inequality of low birth weight ratio (LBWR) using national and provincial survey data. It aims to identify trends, distributions, and inequalities, and predict future outcomes.
